Container.Name: welle.io-cli
Container.Overview: welle.io is an open source DAB and DAB+ software defined radio (SDR) with support for rtl-sdr (RTL2832U) and airspy.

Config.Name: USB bus folder (For automatically selection of the RTL2832U)
Config.Description: You could define here a specific device but when you replug the device the path will change and the container can not start. Keep this in mind.
